alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Hardin; Jefferson; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harrison, southeastern Meade, southwestern Jefferson, northeastern Hardin and southwestern Bullitt Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Brandenburg. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Harrison, southwestern Jefferson, southwestern Bullitt, southeastern Meade and northeastern Hardin Counties, including the following locations... Long View, New Boston, Rock Haven, Grahamton, Hughes Landing, Pitts Point, Buck Grove, Vine Grove, Howard and Dietz Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
